# This file is autogenerated
title: ServerError
description: Overview of the ServerError method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/common/classes/ServerError/constructor
---

Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that no chain was supplied to the client.

<Note>
  `ServerError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all
  supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { ServerError } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### message

`string`

- The error message.

### status

`number`

- The HTTP status code of the error.

### cause

`Error`

- The cause of the error.
